items.title: Awesome Flutter Updates on Apr 15 - Apr 21, 2024
items.summary: 27 awesome projects updated on Apr 15 - Apr 21, 2024
items.content_text:
### Websites / Blogs

*   [Flutter Stack Weekly](https://blog.canopas.com/tagged/canopas-flutter-weekly) - Weekly newsletter on new development and updates curated by [Jimmy Sanghani](https://twitter.com/jimmys0251)

### UI / List

*   [Liquid Pull To Refresh (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/aagarwal1012/Liquid-Pull-To-Refresh) <!--stargazers:aagarwal1012/Liquid-Pull-To-Refresh--> - A beautiful and custom refresh indicator by [Ayush Agarwal](https://github.com/aagarwal1012/).
*   [Super List (‚≠ê363)](https://github.com/superlistapp/super_sliver_list) <!--stargazers:superlistapp/super_sliver_list--> - Drop-in replacement for SliverList and ListView that can handle large amount of items with variable extents by [Matej Knopp](https://github.com/knopp)
*   [Reorderables (‚≠ê757)](https://github.com/hanshengchiu/reorderables) <!--stargazers:hanshengchiu/reorderables--> - Drag\&Drop Table, Row, Column, Wrap(Grid) and SliverList elements by [Hansheng Chiu](https://github.com/hanshengchiu).
*   [Infinite Listview (‚≠ê303)](https://github.com/fluttercommunity/flutter_infinite_listview) <!--stargazers:fluttercommunity/flutter_infinite_listview--> - Infinite scroll in both directions by [Simon Lightfoot](https://github.com/slightfoot).
*   [PlutoGrid (‚≠ê715)](https://github.com/bosskmk/pluto_grid) <!--stargazers:bosskmk/pluto_grid--> - Web and desktop datagrid that can be controlled by the keyboard by [bosskmk](https://github.com/bosskmk).
*   [Typeahead (‚≠ê850)](https://github.com/AbdulRahmanAlHamali/flutter_typeahead) <!--stargazers:AbdulRahmanAlHamali/flutter_typeahead--> - Display overlay suggestions to users as they type by [Abdul Rahman Al Hamali](https://github.com/AbdulRahmanAlHamali)
*   [Snaplist (‚≠ê456)](https://github.com/ariedov/flutter_snaplist) <!--stargazers:ariedov/flutter_snaplist--> - Create snappable list views by [David Leibovych](https://github.com/ariedov)
*   [StaggeredGridView (‚≠ê3.2k)](https://github.com/letsar/flutter_staggered_grid_view) <!--stargazers:letsar/flutter_staggered_grid_view--> - GridView with tiles of variable sizes by [Romain Rastel](https://github.com/letsar)

### UI

*   [Direct Select (‚≠ê800)](https://github.com/LanarsInc/direct-select-flutter) <!--stargazers:LanarsInc/direct-select-flutter--> - Selection widget with an ethereal, full-screen modal popup by [Ivan Yatsouba](https://github.com/iyatsouba).
*   [Timeline Tile (‚≠ê776)](https://github.com/JHBitencourt/timeline_tile) <!--stargazers:JHBitencourt/timeline_tile--> - Tile to help build beautiful and customisable timelines by [Julio Bitencourt](https://github.com/JHBitencourt).
*   [Smooth Page Indicator (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/Milad-Akarie/smooth_page_indicator) <!--stargazers:Milad-Akarie/smooth_page_indicator--> - Customizable animated page indicator with a set of built-in effects. [Milad Akarie](https://github.com/Milad-Akarie)

### UI / UI Helpers

*   [In View Notifier List (‚≠ê681)](https://github.com/rvamsikrishna/inview_notifier_list) <!--stargazers:rvamsikrishna/flutter_offline--> - ListView that notify when widgets are on screen within a provided area by [Vamsi Krishna](https://github.com/inview_notifier_list).
*   [Mix (‚≠ê702)](https://github.com/leoafarias/mix) <!--stargazers:leoafarias/mix--> - An expressive way to effortlessly build design systems by [Leo Farias](https://github.com/leoafarias).
*   [Blurhash (‚≠ê551)](https://github.com/fluttercommunity/flutter_blurhash) <!--stargazers:fluttercommunity/flutter_blurhash--> - Compact representation of a placeholder for an image. Encode a blurry image under 30 caracters by [Robert Felker](https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-felker/)

### Storage / Preferences

*   [Streaming Shared Preferences (‚≠ê248)](https://github.com/roughike/streaming_shared_preferences) <!--stargazers:roughike/streaming_shared_preferences--> - Reactive key-value store, shared preferences with Streams by [Iiro Krankka](https://github.com/roughike)

### Device / Augmented Reality

*   [VPN (‚≠ê367)](https://github.com/X-dea/Flutter_VPN) <!--stargazers:X-dea/Flutter_VPN--> - Access VPN services by [Jason C.H](https://github.com/ctrysbita)
*   [Geolocator (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/baseflow/flutter-geolocator) <!--stargazers:baseflow/flutter-geolocator--> - A Flutter geolocation plugin which provides easy access to the platform specific location services by [Baseflow](https://baseflow.com)
*   [Permission Handler (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/baseflow/flutter-permission-handler) <!--stargazers:baseflow/flutter-permission-handler--> - A Flutter permission plugin which provides a cross-platform (iOS, Android) API to request and check permissions by [Baseflow](https://baseflow.com)
*   [WidgetKit (‚≠ê264)](https://github.com/fasky-software/flutter_widgetkit) <!--stargazers:baseflow/fasky-software/flutter_widgetkit--> - A plugins which allows you to create a Widget-Extention for iOS by [Thomas Leiter](https://github.com/tomLadder)
*   [Live Activities (‚≠ê217)](https://github.com/istornz/live_activities) <!--stargazers:istornz/live_activities--> - A plugin to use iOS live activities & Dynamic Island features by [Dimitri Dessus](https://github.com/istornz)

### State management / Standard

*   [Get It (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/fluttercommunity/get_it) <!--stargazers:fluttercommunity/get_it--> - Simple direct Service Locator that allows to decouple the interface from a concrete implementation by [Thomas Burkhartb](https://twitter.com/Thomasburkhartb)
*   [GetX (‚≠ê11k)](https://github.com/jonataslaw/getx) <!--stargazers:jonataslaw/getx--> - Contextless, State-management & navigation by [Jonny Borges](https://github.com/jonataslaw)
*   [MobX (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/mobxjs/mobx.dart) <!--stargazers:mobxjs/mobx.dart--> - Supercharge the state-management in your apps with Transparent Functional Reactive Programming (TFRP). Port of MobX from the Js/React land.
*   [Signals (‚≠ê615)](https://github.com/rodydavis/signals.dart) <!--stargazers:rodydavis/signals.dart--> - Reactive programming made simple. Port of Signals pattern by [Rody Davis](https://github.com/rodydavis)

### Game / Game Engine resources

*   [Awesome Flame (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/flame-engine/awesome-flame) <!--stargazers:flame-engine/awesome-flame--> - Curated list of the best Flame games, projects, libraries, tools, tutorials, articles and more by [Flame Engine](https://github.com/flame-engine)

### üá∫üá∏ United States / Misc

*   Meetup [NYC](https://www.meetup.com/flutter-nyc/)
items.content_html:
Websites / Blogs

  • Flutter Stack Weekly - Weekly newsletter on new development and updates curated by Jimmy Sanghani

UI / List

  • Liquid Pull To Refresh (‚≠ê1.3k) - A beautiful and custom refresh indicator by Ayush Agarwal.
  • Super List (‚≠ê363) - Drop-in replacement for SliverList and ListView that can handle large amount of items with variable extents by Matej Knopp
  • Reorderables (‚≠ê757) - Drag&Drop Table, Row, Column, Wrap(Grid) and SliverList elements by Hansheng Chiu.
  • Infinite Listview (‚≠ê303) - Infinite scroll in both directions by Simon Lightfoot.
  • PlutoGrid (‚≠ê715) - Web and desktop datagrid that can be controlled by the keyboard by bosskmk.
  • Typeahead (‚≠ê850) - Display overlay suggestions to users as they type by Abdul Rahman Al Hamali
  • Snaplist (‚≠ê456) - Create snappable list views by David Leibovych
  • StaggeredGridView (‚≠ê3.2k) - GridView with tiles of variable sizes by Romain Rastel

UI

  • Direct Select (‚≠ê800) - Selection widget with an ethereal, full-screen modal popup by Ivan Yatsouba.
  • Timeline Tile (‚≠ê776) - Tile to help build beautiful and customisable timelines by Julio Bitencourt.
  • Smooth Page Indicator (‚≠ê1.4k) - Customizable animated page indicator with a set of built-in effects. Milad Akarie

UI / UI Helpers

  • In View Notifier List (‚≠ê681) - ListView that notify when widgets are on screen within a provided area by Vamsi Krishna.
  • Mix (‚≠ê702) - An expressive way to effortlessly build design systems by Leo Farias.
  • Blurhash (‚≠ê551) - Compact representation of a placeholder for an image. Encode a blurry image under 30 caracters by Robert Felker

Storage / Preferences

  • Streaming Shared Preferences (‚≠ê248) - Reactive key-value store, shared preferences with Streams by Iiro Krankka

Device / Augmented Reality

  • VPN (‚≠ê367) - Access VPN services by Jason C.H
  • Geolocator (‚≠ê1.3k) - A Flutter geolocation plugin which provides easy access to the platform specific location services by Baseflow
  • Permission Handler (‚≠ê2.1k) - A Flutter permission plugin which provides a cross-platform (iOS, Android) API to request and check permissions by Baseflow
  • WidgetKit (‚≠ê264) - A plugins which allows you to create a Widget-Extention for iOS by Thomas Leiter
  • Live Activities (‚≠ê217) - A plugin to use iOS live activities & Dynamic Island features by Dimitri Dessus

State management / Standard

  • Get It (‚≠ê1.4k) - Simple direct Service Locator that allows to decouple the interface from a concrete implementation by Thomas Burkhartb
  • GetX (‚≠ê11k) - Contextless, State-management & navigation by Jonny Borges
  • MobX (‚≠ê2.4k) - Supercharge the state-management in your apps with Transparent Functional Reactive Programming (TFRP). Port of MobX from the Js/React land.
  • Signals (‚≠ê615) - Reactive programming made simple. Port of Signals pattern by Rody Davis

Game / Game Engine resources

  • Awesome Flame (‚≠ê1.2k) - Curated list of the best Flame games, projects, libraries, tools, tutorials, articles and more by Flame Engine

üá∫üá∏ United States / Misc

  • Meetup NYC
